error.message: Подключение не установлено, т.к. конечный компьютер отверг запрос на подключение [::1]:2247
error.detail:
System.ServiceModel.EndpointNotFoundException: There was no endpoint listening at http://localhost:2247/UserService/Storage.svc that could accept the message. This is often caused by an incorrect address or SOAP action.
